mainPackage

Class VoxelObject

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.geom.RectangularShape
      • java.awt.geom.Rectangle2D
        • java.awt.geom.Rectangle2D.Float
          • mainPackage.VoxelObject
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.Shape, java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Cloneable

    public class VoxelObject
extends java.awt.geom.Rectangle2D.Float
implements java.io.Serializable
    Intern class which represents a single voxel. The object which provides in a single object the index and radiation value of the material which fills the voxel.
    Author:
    Guitard Alan
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
